document_data.name: The Mermaid's Arms
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mermaid's Arms''' was a pricey and busy tavern, inn, and [[festhall]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]], ran by [[Calathia Frost]] ''circa'' midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was still a fairly new establishment ''circa'' [[1363 DR]].
document_data.Location: This establishment was located halfway along [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]].
document_data.Structure: The Mermaid's Arms was a bright and large establishment, standing three stories tall. The Arms consisted of a series of smaller lounges and dining halls, richly decorated with posh blue tapestries that reminded its patrons of the sea.

Services.Prices: The Mermaid's Arms charged its clients separately for rooms, food, libations, and companionship, which often came up to a significant expense.

document_data.Staff: The Mermaid's Arms's proprietor was Calathia Frost in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR. She was known to the regulars for her deep sultry voice and quiet business-like demeanor.
document_data.History: [[Tia]], a server at the Arms in the late 14{{th}} century DR, was kidnapped by a tribe of [[kobold]]s in [[1370 DR]] and held hostage for several months in [[Undermountain]].
